original_title: Sri Lanka sells extra Rs8.2bn Treasury bills after auction
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka has sold 8,200 million rupees of treasury bills offered on tap at an average rate of 7.61 percent, 7.91 percent and 8.03 percent, the state debt office said.
A total of 90.2 billion rupees in treasury bills was sold this week.
On Wednesday (6) the debt office raised 82 billion rupees of 3, 6 and 12 month bills.
